name: SPEEDUNGEON
description:
SPEEDUNGEON is our entry for the third Blackthorn Prod Game Jam. The goal of the game is to get to the portal at the end of each level as fast as you can with as few deaths, kills and items as you can muster. Speed your way through 6 levels and try to achieve a high score!

More kills = less speed

Collect potions to restore lost speed.

CONTROLS
Move - Arrow Keys Left and Right
Jump - X, Arrow Key Up or Spacebar
Shoot - Z or Left Control

CREDITS
Anthony Mattison (Twitter@left_shoe18) - programming, music, sound effects, lead design
Yu1_S3raph - art, additional design
Jayesh - additional design
